title: Scientific Experience Design Bridging Technology and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science knowledge and basic understanding of digital device usage
context.additional_context: Designed to prioritize analyzing and evaluating science phenomena encountered in daily life using technology-based tools. Learning outcomes are measured via project-based assessments, including online collaborative activities among learners.

learning_goals: Learners can elaborate technology-based science learning scenarios using the LXD (Learning Experience Design) framework.
Learners can apply quantitative and qualitative tools to evaluate the usability of science content on online platforms (LMS).
Learners can write interpretive reports on scientific phenomena and incorporate peer feedback through project-based assessment methods.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
